description: No file-type blocklist: attachments with arbitrary mime/ext are accepted (e.g. .zip)
Inline/CID attachments are skipped by default (no document/file created)
Idempotency: duplicate processing of same attachment does not create duplicate docs/files
Idempotency: failures are recorded and do not duplicate on retry
Attachment ingestion creates file_stores + documents + document_associations rows
System attribution: stored file uploaded_by_id and document created_by/user_id use system user
Microsoft: file attachment downloads and stores correct bytes and metadata
Microsoft: unsupported attachment types are skipped and recorded
Gmail: attachment downloads and stores correct bytes and metadata
New ticket: inbound email w/ attachments results in ticket documents
Reply: threaded reply w/ attachments results in ticket documents on same ticket
Attachment failure does not block ticket/comment creation
All distributed-table updates include tenant filter; no scatter/gather updates
